public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
invoke as: java -cp <classpath> tests.NumericalConvolutionTest <lowerlimit> <upperlimit> < a > < b > < step > < jplotfilename > . Computes the convolution of the two functions x^2 (x≤0) and normpdf with respect to the first variable from a to b and creates a jplot file to visualize the convolution function.
